channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: AOC’s 27-inch 1440p QD-OLED gaming monitor is down to $380
item.description: It’s tough not to gush about a 27-inch 1440p QD-OLED gaming monitor that costs under $400 (I’ve done it before!). AOC’s G-Sync-compatible model with a 240Hz refresh rate and a near-instant response time is down to $379.99 at Best Buy, which matches the lowest price I’ve ever seen for a model with these specs. This […]

item.title: Pourquoi le Leica Leitzphone va faire de l’ombre au Xiaomi 17 Ultra
item.description: Leica et Xiaomi semblent avoir encore une carte dans sa manche pour le MWC 2026.

item.title: Roborock Saros 20 et Curv 2 Flow : les nouveaux aspirateurs-robots arrivent en France
item.description: Roborock annonce la commercialisation d’un nouvel aspirateur balai et de deux nouvelles séries d’aspirateurs robots connectés, chacune déclinée en deux modèles. Ces nouveautés, dévoilées lors du CES 2026, seront commercialisé à partir du 26 février 2026.

item.title: Anthropic's Claude Code Security is available now after finding 500+ vulnerabilities: how security leaders should respond
item.description: Anthropic pointed its most advanced AI model, Claude Opus 4.6, at production open-source codebases and found a plethora of security holes: more than 500 high-severity vulnerabilities that had survived decades of expert review and millions of hours of fuzzing, with each candidate vetted through internal and external security review before disclosure. Fifteen days later, the company productized the capability and launched Claude Code Security.Security directors responsible for seven-figure vulnerability management stacks should expect a common question from their boards in the next review cycle....

item.title: La couleur iconique de l’iPhone 18 Pro serait un magnifique rouge
item.description: Apple réfléchit aux coloris des futurs iPhone 18 Pro et Pro Max. L'un d'eux est en cours de test.

item.title: Comment résilier son forfait mobile ? Voici la démarche pas à pas !
item.description: Vous avez envie de changer de forfait, mais vous ne savez pas comment vous y prendre ? Sachez que résilier son ancien forfait est simple comme bonjour, mais il y a plusieurs choses à savoir avant de s'y prendre. Voici la procédure à suivre.

item.title: Heated Rivals Musk and Altman Disagree on One More Thing: Data Centers in Space
item.description: In a recent appearance, OpenAI CEO Sam Altman called the idea "ridiculous."

item.title: After ‘Cosmic Orange’ This Could Be the iPhone 18 Pro’s Must-Have Color
item.description: Apple is finally leaning into fun colors.

item.title: Are you tradeshow-ready? Because VistaPrint just cut up to 25% off premium business cards, custom mugs, and promo gear
item.description: Stand out on the expo floor with big discounts on custom business cards, mugs, tumblers, t-shirts, flyers, and more.

item.title: Waaaa! A new Super Mario Galaxy Movie leak has spoiled a major character reveal — and it's another of the Nintendo mascot's popular foes
item.description: The new Nintendo and Universal film has seemingly had one of its biggest surprises ruined ahead of release.

item.title: Quel forfait mobile pour l’Angleterre ? Nos conseils pour communiquer et rester connecté
item.description: Vous avez prévu un voyage au Royaume-Uni, mais vous souhaitez savoir comment vous allez pouvoir communiquer avec vos proches restés en France sans en payer le prix fort ? Voici les meilleurs forfaits mobiles pour l'Angleterre.

item.title: Russian hacker uses multiple AI tools to break hundreds of firewalls
item.description: A low-skilled threat actor was able to do a lot with the help of AI, Amazon researchers warn.

item.title: Corsair brade à -35 % son écran PC QD-OLED incurvé de 34 pouces (WQHD et 240 Hz) taillé pour le gaming
item.description: Le Xeneon 34WQHD240 de Corsair est un écran PC idéal pour jouer aux jeux vidéo grâce à son taux de rafraîchissement de 240 Hz et son temps de réponse de 0,03 ms. En ce moment, il est disponible pour 999,99 euros.

item.title: Tuta dévoile Tuta Drive, une solution de stockage chiffrée et européenne
item.description: Tuta lance Tuta Drive en version alpha. La marque allemande veut en faire une référence du stockage de données en respectant votre vie privée.

item.title: Nvidia prépare une petite révolution technique pour booster les performances des jeux sous Linux
item.description: Nvidia prendrait-il enfin Linux au sérieux ? Une série d'offres d'emploi semble indiquer que la firme prévoit d'améliorer les performances des jeux et de ses propres pilotes sur l'OS.

item.title: Les 10 smartphones les plus populaires de la semaine sur Frandroid : Samsung, Xiaomi, Google et OnePlus bataillent pour la 1ère place
item.description: Pour notre top 10 des smartphones les plus populaires de la semaine sur Frandroid, les constructeurs Android sont à la bataille. Samsung, Xiaomi, Google et OnePlus placent tous un modèle dans notre top de la semaine.

item.title: Xbox shakeup: Phil Spencer and Sarah Bond are leaving Microsoft
item.description: After nearly 40 years at Microsoft, Xbox chief and Microsoft Gaming CEO Phil Spencer is leaving the company, along with Xbox president Sarah Bond. Spencer’s retirement was announced in a memo from Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella on February 20th, stating, “Last year, Phil Spencer made the decision to retire from the company, and since then […]

item.title: Le fondateur de VLC menace de quitter la France à cause du ministre de la Justice
item.description: Jean-Baptiste Kempf, créateur de VLC, le fameux couteau suisse de la vidéo, est en colère et menace de quitter la France, tout simplement. En cause : le ministère de la Justice empêche sa femme de devenir juge, malgré sa réussite au concours de l'ENM.

item.title: 2026: Beginning the year with an ethics-first strategy
item.description: Why founders must embed ethical redlines, reviews, and stopping rules before scaling.

item.title: C’est la fin d’une ère : l’application Météo vit ses derniers instants sur Android
item.description: Google a commencé à débrancher discrètement son application Météo native au profit d'une application web plus classique. Voici les changements.

item.title: ‘A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms’ Ends With a Tease of Adventures to Come
item.description: Dunk bids a melancholy farewell to Ashford Meadow in ‘The Morrow.’

item.title: L’illusion de la RAM chinoise à bas prix s’effondre : la DDR5 coûte de plus en plus cher
item.description: Vous espériez monter votre prochaine machine à moindre coût en lorgnant du côté des composants asiatiques ? Mauvaise nouvelle pour les joueurs. L'illusion d'une mémoire vive chinoise bradée vient de se dissiper, propulsant les barrettes DDR5 à des tarifs faramineux, strictement alignés sur le reste du monde.

item.title: Hank Green will gladly take billionaire money for education videos
item.description: Today, I’m talking with Hank Green, a longtime friend of Decoder and the cofounder and now former owner of Complexly, an online education company he started with his brother John in 2012. I say former owner because Hank and John have just converted Complexly into a nonprofit and given up their ownership of the company […]

item.title: 5 days left to lock in the lowest TechCrunch Disrupt 2026 ticket rates
item.description: 5 days to save up to $680 on your TechCrunch Disrupt 2026 ticket. These lowest rates of the year disappear on February 27 at 11:59 p.m. PT. Register here.

item.description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

item.title: Boys of Tommen — everything we know so far about the Prime Video TV series adaptation
item.description: A TV adaptation of Boys of Tommen is officially on the way – here's everything we know so far, from release date prediction, trailer, possible cast, plot rumors and more.

item.title: Windows 11 : vous allez pouvoir reprendre votre conversation WhatsApp depuis un smartphone en un clic
item.description: WhatsApp teste actuellement une nouvelle fonctionnalité avec Microsoft pour permettre aux utilisateurs de reprendre une discussion sur Windows 11 exactement là où ils l’avaient laissée sur Android.

item.title: Inside Microsoft’s big Xbox leadership shake-up
item.description: Xbox fans had been anticipating the retirement of Microsoft Gaming CEO Phil Spencer for years, but what most hadn't expected was the departure of Xbox president Sarah Bond too. For many outside the company, Bond seemed like Spencer's natural successor, a deputy of sorts. Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella and Microsoft CFO Amy Hood clearly didn't […]

item.title: How to listen to T20 World Cup on BBC Radio 5 Live from anywhere in the world
item.description: Here's how to listen to the T20 World Cup cricket from anywhere in the world with BBC Radio 5 Live.

item.title: How AI agents could destroy the economy
item.description: Citrini Research imagines a report from two years in the future, in which unemployment has doubled and the total value of the stock market has fallen by more than a third.

item.title: The 3 best TV deals to shop this week: Save up to 50% on Samsung, LG, and Hisense
item.description: Save up to 50% on a new TV this week with these deals on Samsung, LG, and Hisense models at Amazon.

item.title: How to watch England vs. Pakistan in the 2026 T20 World Cup online for free
item.description: How to watch T20 World Cup for free. Live stream England vs. Pakistan in the 2026 T20 World Cup for free from anywhere in the world.

item.title: Quels sont les meilleurs babyphones connectés en 2025 ? Nous les avons testés et comparés
item.description: La surveillance de nos charmantes têtes blondes s'est adaptée au fil des années, la rendant de plus en plus connectée. Pour vous aider à trouver l'appareil de votre choix, nous avons testé et comparé quelques modèles. Voici quels sont les meilleurs babyphones connectés selon vos besoins.

item.title: Anker's new 45W Nano charger with smart display is already $10 off
item.description: Anker introduced a nifty little charger at CES 2026, which is a refresh of the pre-existing Nano Charger. It's already on sale for $30 for Prime members, which is a discount of $10. The 45W charger includes a smart display that shows real-time data like power flow, temperature and charging status. It also features "fun animations to keep things cheerful." Anker says it can recognize what's being charged and automatically adjust certain metrics to ensure a longer battery lifespan. To that end, it works with just about everything. The company advertises that this charger is a good fit for the i...

item.title: Darty casse le prix du Samsung Galaxy Book 5 Pro juste avant la sortie du Galaxy Book 6 Pro
item.description: Avec ses nombreuses fonctionnalités liées à l'intelligence artificielle et ses 16 Go de RAM, le Samsung Galaxy Book 5 Pro est un laptop qui pourra répondre à une grande partie de vos besoins et il est disponible chez Darty avec une promotion de 35 %.

item.title: « Il n’y a pas d’autre solution » : les PC de cette marque vont très bientôt coûter plus cher
item.description: La crise de la RAM continue de faire gonfler le prix des appareils électroniques. Dans peu de temps, les PC de cette marque populaire seront touchés.

item.title: Defense Secretary summons Anthropic’s Amodei over military use of Claude
item.description: Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth has summoned Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei to the Pentagon for a tense discussion over the military's use of Claude. Hegseth has threatened to designate Anthropic a "supply chain risk."

item.title: Nothing shows us the Nothing Phone 4a ahead of time
item.description: Nothing has decided to show us its upcoming Nothing 4a phone ahead of time.

item.title: Découverte des Galaxy S26 sur Unlock Talk et double Matinale : notre programme Twitch de la semaine s’annonce chaud
item.description: Notre programme Twitch de la semaine du lundi 23 févier 2026, c’est juste ici : nous vous donnons rendez-vous, mardi, mercredi et vendredi sur notre chaîne Frandroidlive, autant pour siroter votre café devant notre Matinale Tech' que pour découvrir les nouveautés Samsung lors de la première Galaxy Unpacked.

item.title: Cord cutters should get a digital antenna if they havent already
item.description: Every cord cutter should have a digital antenna. Here's why and what you should look for.

item.title: How Trump will use his upcoming State of the Union address
item.description: Trump said he will discuss the economy, a ‘mess’ he inherited from President Biden. President Donald Trump’s State of the Union address on Tuesday is likely to be a test run of the message Republicans will give to voters in November’s elections for control of the House and the Senate.The president and his party appear vulnerable, with polls showing much of America distrusts how Trump has managed the government in his first year back in office. In addition, the Supreme Court last week struck down one of the chief levers of his economic and foreign policy by ruling he lacked the power to impose ...

item.title: Elevation Lab's AirTag 10-year extended battery case is only $16 right now
item.description: AirTags are basically an essential accessory for iPhone users who want to keep track of things like their keys, wallet and backpack. While it's easy enough to replace the battery in both versions of the AirTag, you may not want to have to rush to do so at the end of the battery's roughly two-year lifespan. That's where Elevation Lab's extended battery case for the AirTag comes in, and it's heavily discounted right now: it's 30 percent off and down to $16. The case usually sells for $23, so that's a 30 percent discount. It's not the first time we've seen this deal, but it's a pretty decent one ...

item.title: Anthropic claims half of its agent tool calls are to do with software engineering - so are developers letting AI take over?
item.description: Agentic AI is quite happy being left alone to its own devices, checking in with users when it need to clarify any details.

item.title: India's streaming giant lodges criminal complaint against ExpressVPN over alleged copyright-breaching marketing
item.description: JioStar has escalated its anti-piracy efforts by filing a criminal complaint against ExpressVPN, alleging that the provider’s marketing actively encourages users to bypass geo-restrictions to watch copyrighted content.

item.title: Russell T Davies Has Planned Out Multiple Versions of the Return of ‘Doctor Who’
item.description: Plus, somehow, 'Charlie's Angels' returned?

item.title: This genius clamp instantly transforms your tote into a crossbody bag
item.description: Design studio CQW&T designed Snatch to attach a shoulder strap without damaging fabric. Cheap tote bag collections everywhere just got an attachable clip-on upgrade.

item.title: Anker is one of my favorite power bank brands — and its PowerCore 10K is a bargain
item.description: The handy Anker PowerCore 10K power bank drops to under $20 at Amazon — here's why I recommend picking one up while it's so cheap.
